                            <p class="clearfix"><span class="role">角色扮演</span><span class="links"><a target="_blank" href="http://qm.youxi.com" data-bk="youxi-index-promptgames-7" >官网</a><em>|</em><a target="_blank" href="http://bbs.youxi.com/forum-635-636-1.html" data-bk="youxi-index-promptgames-7" >论坛</a></span></p>
                        </div>
                    </li>
                                        <li>
                    <a target="_blank" data-bk="youxi-index-promptgames-8" href="http://sglw.youxi.com" class="img"><img width="216" height="128" src="http://p8.yx-s.com/t01e4036127d1d10182.jpg" /></a>
                        <div class="imgHover moved">

            </div>
        </div>
